attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support bunker boy but it took forever to download! And after that when I opened the app it was sUPER laggy and did not pass the vibe check after downloading it my phone almost broke and I almost fell down the stairs do NOT download this app my cats started doing cult dances and chanting “👽⟟⏁⋉⟒👽⟒⋔⍜⊑👽⍀⏃⏁⏃⌿⏃⍀⏃⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⎍⋔⎍👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍀⏃⏁⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⌰⏃⏁⟒⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⋔⍜⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍜⌰⋔⟒⋏⏃👽⎅⟒⌿⏃⎅⏃⍀⟟👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽 ⎅⟟⋔⟒⎅⏃⟒👽” very scary experience and my fish started singing “𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣” once again, another traumatic experience. And once all that happened I opened the app and saw a bunker boy Cheeto puff looking dude everywhere and I hated it 10/10 would NOT recommend this app is ✨𝓼𝓱𝓪𝓭𝔂✨
Anyways stream Easy, God menu, etc
Stan Skz
